page.title: 10Thurnham
page.content: There are ten houses of which five are farmhouses. There is one empty farmhouse, a lighthouse cottage and three other houses. Cockersand lighthouse and Plover Scar lighthouse used to be lit manually twice a day but are now lit by Calor gas and electricity. The main occupation is farming but there are two teachers who work in Lancaster. Six people work at the caravan park and two are retired. Primary school children go to Glasson Dock or to Cockerham both C. of E. schools. Secondary and Grammar schools are at Lancaster and Garstang.
